General.Description: MONA stands for Monacoin is the first cryptocurrency made from Japan. It was launched in December 2013 through 2 channels and now has over 600 active message boards. It is getting become  one of the most popular sites in Japan. Moroever, Monacoin community is the most active cryptocurrency users community in Japan.
General.Features: Monacoin is said to be the more like points accrued to be spent only in the monacoin network than supposed to be similar to securities. Its name and logo are based on 'Mona', a cat-like ASCII art character and the Monacoin tips are popular with manga fans.
General.Technology: Monacoin is based on DigiShield difficulty algorithm. It is a peer-to-peer payment network and digital currency based on an open source protocol. Some data that belong to MONA are 1.5 minute block targets, the number of coin is 105,120,000 and the volume is 50 coins per block.
